summary: family and friends of man shot dead by police last month are in shock after a billboard featuring the officer who pulled the trigger was erected in kenosham , wisconsin . aaron siler , 26 , was fatally shot after he ' armed himself with a weapon ' after being confronted by officer pablo torres on march 14 . torres is currently on leave pending the outcome of the investigation into the deadly shooting . in the meantime a billboard , paid for by the kenosha professional police association , has been erected featuring a photograph of torres and his dog . '
aspect: Family and friends of man shot dead by police last month are in shock after a billboard featuring the officer who pulled the trigger was erected in Kenosham, Wisconsin. Aaron Siler, 26, was fatally shot after he 'armed himself with a weapon' after being confronted by officer Pablo Torres on March 14. Torres is currently on leave pending the outcome of the investigation into the deadly shooting.  Aaron Siler was fatally shot after he 'armed himself with a weapon' after being confronted by officer Pablo Torres on March 14.
explain: Aaron Siler was shot and killed by officer Pablo Torres last month, leading to shock and disappointment from Siler's family and friends, due to a billboard featuring Torres and his dog being erected in Kenosha, Wisconsin.
